attributes.action: Make children exempt from coronavirus "rule of six"
attributes.additional_details: Amend legislation to include an exemption for under 12s when calculating group sizes.
attributes.background: Remove under 12s from calculations of group size in relation to coronavirus regulations. This will prevent families being discriminated against.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
